tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
I booked his appointment through Practo, to check about my heart condition and BP fluctuations. He is very friendly and having the the patience to listen to patients. I asked him to do ECG and TMT, but he suggested not required. Still he did ECG on my wife request and found everything normal.

Good quality about this doctor:
Listens well
Understand our concern
Make feel comfortable
In his cabin he is having all facilities of ECG, TMT etc
He gives his clear recommendation
He diagnoses well before concluding
He suggested me for no treatment and suggested for master health checkup

I recommend him any people having issues related to cardio or anything related to heart BP etc

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: DR Sunil has been treating my dad who is around 80 years old, given my dad's age I appreciate the patience he has in dealing such cases and all providing all the insight on what the issue is and how to deal with it. I appreciate his commitment and all that he does for the patients.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: my father's main artery was blocked 90% leading to heart attack, from our earlier interaction with dr. Sunil Kumar, we decided to take him to columbia asia hebbal for Dr. to treat him and put the stent in complex location. Dr.Sunil Kumar did the procedure so elegantly, today my father is getting discharged in very good mood. Thank you sir, we will always be indebted to you.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr Sunil Kumar is an expert Doctor **** **** ********* and patient friendly. I was treated 2 yrs ago for angioplasty with two stents and sincethen I do not have problem. My recent visit was for regular check-up and I am very happy about alround service.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Mine was an emergency situation at the time, but in general, for me, it makes a big difference when the doctor is willing to take the time to explain things to me. In that regard, and later on, he answered my questions adequately. I found him approachable, and took the time to discuss up-coming procedures and options available. That was important and made a big difference.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Dr. Sunil has a in-depth experience in Angioplasty related illness. He made me understand the problem in detail and impact of the procedure, which made me take decision to go ahead with the Angioplasty. Post procedure, he was thorough with check-up and recommended best possible recovery process, which helped me heal faster.

He has been my go to person for emergency and health advice , which is crucial for my well-being. 

Strongly recommend him for cardio related treatment.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Dr Sunil Kumar is a very professional doctor. Recently he did a  procedure and closed the hole in my heart. Procedure was painless and without anesthesia. I could get discharged next day. He explained the do and don'ts after the procedure very well. Overall experience with him was very satisfactory and I recommend him for all cardiac problems.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Dr Sunil Kumar was very professional and meticulous in assessing my aliment and giving proper advice. He stressed the equal importance of diet and exercise in addition to medication for effective control of my hypertension. After consulting with him my blood pressure is controlled effectively. I had a pleasant experience with him and happy to recommend him to others with heart diseases.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Doctor Sunil had been referred by his Professor Dr.Ramesh for my father of 78yrs old for Ischemic heart disease. Later he had block which was rectified through Coronary Angioplasty by Dr.Sunil. Today we have gone for review. My father is very much comfortable now. Dr.Sunil is a humble and patient friendly. He gives confidence and support to patience which are the best qualities that each doctor should imbibe from him. I feel happy and honoured in writing this review.

Dr. Sunil Kumar and his entire staff were through professional and friendly. I had a good understanding of the process and my health results throughout the process. They were on time and communicative. Dr. Always listen to patients, exams everything and explain medical terms. Highly recommend.
